faqs.q: Does it support online reservations for customers?
faqs.a: No. The MVP is provider-only — customers don't self-book yet, reservations are created by staff. After the pilot we're considering a "Request Link" so customers can submit a request.
We manage onboarding capacity and want to know the operation we're working with. It's not bureaucracy — it's our guarantee that every launch goes well.

faqs.q: How do I get my Excel data into the system?
faqs.a: Kitloop supports CSV import for inventory. We'll help you with the conversion during onboarding.

faqs.q: How long does it take to get started?
faqs.a: Depends on the size of your inventory. We'll guide you through it step by step — importing data, reviewing the workflow, and making sure your team is ready.
Deposit tracking and notes are part of the handover flow. Payment transactions (online payments, refunds) are not part of the core MVP flow.
